english.segment1: God above all the world in motion. God above all my hopes and fears. I don't care what the world throws at me now. It's gonna be alright
english.segment2: Hear the sound of the generations. Making loud our freedom song. All in all that the world would know Your name. It's gonna be alright
english.segment3: 'Cause I know my God saved the day. And I know His word never fails. And I know my God made a way for me. Salvation is here
english.segment4: God above all the world in motion. God above all my hopes and fears. I don't care what the world throws at me now. It's gonna be alright
english.segment5: 'Cause I know my God saved the day. And I know His word never fails. And I know my God made a way for me. Salvation is here
english.segment6: 'Cause I know my God saved the day. And I know His word never fails. And I know my God made a way for me. Salvation is here
english.segment7: Salvation is here. Salvation is here and He lives in me. Salvation is here. Salvation that died just to set me free. Salvation is here. Salvation is here and He lives in me. Salvation is here
english.segment8: Cause You are alive and You live in me. Salvation is here. salvation is here and it lives in me. Salvation is here. Savation is here that died just to set me free. Salvation is here. Salvation is here and it lives in me
english.segment9: Cause You are alive and You live in me. Salvation is here. salvation is here and it lives in me. Salvation is here. Savation is here that died just to set me free. Salvation is here. Salvation is here and it lives in me
